short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides digital noise related to Elon Musk.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever felt that people on the internet talk too much about one person?
Do you want to reduce the amount of digital noise in your Twitter and LinkedIn feed?

This extension replaces paragraphs containing the words "Elon Musk" with interesting facts.
You don't see questionable hot takes and you learn something new. Win-win.
